title: Social Status
body:
Social Status
  MediRecords allows you to add information on the patient's social status to contribute to the completeness of the record. This article will demonstrate how to use this feature.

NOTE: This section will only be available if the patient's age is 18 years or older.

1. Open the Patient Record.

2. Click on the Details tab if you are not brought there automatically.



3. Click on the Social section.



4. Fill in the section with all the required details. The following has been filled in as an example.



5. Click Save to apply the changes.



The patient's details have now been updated.
